message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $6,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $6,900.
